scripts.ios:cleanup: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf /tmp/metro-* && rm -rf node_modules/.cache ../.cache ../node_modules/.cache 2>/dev/null || true && watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && cd ios && rm -rf build Pods Podfile.lock && rm -rf sampleApp.xcworkspace/xcuserdata sampleApp.xcodeproj/xcuserdata sampleApp.xcodeproj/project.xcworkspace/xcuserdata 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.ios:new:pods: npm run ios:cleanup && cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install
scripts.ios:old:pods: npm run ios:cleanup && cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod install
scripts.android:clean: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.android:new: npm run android:clean && npx react-native run-android --active-arch-only -- -PnewArchEnabled=true
scripts.android:old: npm run android:clean && npx react-native run-android --active-arch-only -- -PnewArchEnabled=false
